---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}

admissions %>%
  select(financial_year, health_board, number_of_admissions) %>% 
  gt() %>%
  cols_label(
    financial_year = "Year",
    health_board = "Health Board",
    number_of_admissions = "No. of Admisisons") %>% 
  tab_header(title = "Total Number of Admissions by Health Board") %>% 
  tab_options(heading.title.font.weight = "bold",
              heading.title.font.size = "large") %>% 
  gt_color_rows(number_of_admissions, palette = "ggsci::blue_material")
```
